question.en-US: What is the item positioned directly in front of me?
question.zh-CN: 我正前方的物品是什么？
question.zh-HK: 我正前方的物品係乜嘢？

question.en-US: Can you tell me what item is on my left side?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我我左边的是什么项目吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我我左邊嘅係乜嘢項目啊？

question.en-US: What object is positioned to my right?
question.zh-CN: 什么物体位于我的右边？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物體位於我嘅右邊？

question.en-US: Can you tell me which item is the closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我哪个项目离我最近吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我邊個項目離我最近啊？

question.en-US: What is the item nearest to the center of the frame?
question.zh-CN: 最靠近画面中心的物品是什么？
question.zh-HK: 最靠近畫面中心嘅物品係乜嘢？
